    • Create

      public static void Create(String name, String addr, int id, String age, String seniority, List<String> pastProyects, List<String> actualProyects)
      Calls the create method of model with the data sent
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the worker
      addr - Address of the worker
      id - Id of the Worker
      age - Age of the worker (birthday)
      seniority - Seniority of the worker (birthday)
      pastProyects - Past projects of the worker
      actualProyects - Actual projects of the worker

    • Search

      public static boolean Search(int id)
      Calls the search method of the model with the id sent
      Parameters:
      id - Id of the worker
      Returns:
      true if the id exists on the database and false otherwise
